tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Enter the tasks you want to run.

bubbleEndpoint.title: Bubble.io Endpoint
bubbleEndpoint.description: URL for where you want to send the data to. Leave blank if you do not want to send data to an API.

apiEndpoint.title: API Endpoint
apiEndpoint.description: URL for where you want to send the data to

mustHaveDate.title: Must have date
mustHaveDate.description: If checked, the article must have a date of release to be considered valid.
